structure.unit: ARTICLE III. DADE COUNTY VESSEL MOORING CODE

text.section:
Sec. 7-31. Short title; definitions; scope.
This article shall be known as the "Dade County Vessel Mooring Code" and shall apply to the entire Biscayne Bay, Miami River and their tributaries in Dade County, Florida, whether within or without the limits of municipalities.
The word "vessels" as used herein includes all craft, boats, ships, barges, and floating structures. The standards for the mooring of vessels provided herein shall not pertain to emergencies, or during periods of hurricane watch and hurricane warning as designated by the United States Weather Bureau and a three-day period after the said hurricane watch or warning.
